title: 86/185/ECSC: Commission Decision of 2 April 1986 establishing the delivery levels of ECSC steel products of Portuguese origin onto the rest of the common market, excluding Spain (Only the Portuguese text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 2 April 1986
establishing the delivery levels of ECSC steel products of Portuguese origin onto the rest of the common market, excluding Spain
(Only the Portuguese text is authentic)
(86/185/ECSC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Deliveries of ECSC steel products of Portuguese origin onto the rest of the Community market, excluding Spain, may not exceed 90 000 tonnes.
This Decision is addressed to the Republic of Portugal.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 2 April 1986.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Vice-President
